subject: re:Don't miss this unique chance
body:
Dear valued member.
You have an excellent opportunity to save money purchasing your products.
We supply our customers with affordable and safe Canadian products which are of the same quality as American drugs. 
Click herehttp://canthis.hk
High quality of our products is the subject of our primary concern.No fraud and no scamming is possible.
Sincerely yours,Emilio North
